originalText.text: My car was a mess. Got in and asked them to do a detailed cleaning. They had it for about 5 hours and did a great job. It was a lot cleaner than I thought it ever could be. Had to recommended. Not too pricey

originalText.text: Never picks up phone, I’ve been calling for the last two-three days. Just gonna go somewhere based on this initial customer service.

text.text: Never picks up phone, I’ve been calling for the last two-three days. Just gonna go somewhere based on this initial customer service.

originalText.text: They do not do a good job. If you are looking for a fast wash this is it but they dont pay attention to detail and you should pay attention to the added scratches when they are done. Sloppy and fast despite high prices. The inside of my car was not cleaned properly. It was unimpressive and I am Never going back there. I can get better service at lower prices.

originalText.text: Expensive. $17 for exterior only. They did clean the car OK but don't feel it was worth it. Would of expected the tires being polished as well and would of been more comfortable with the price.

originalText.text: They kept on damaging my oil adapter for my car, it’s not worth it , I’m glad I had warranty or it would of been a $1,850 job just for getting a $122 oil change & they did it three times, the dealership asked me who was doing my oil changes ( LMC 1st ave detailing center
